description:
Two Season One veterans tangle in their first match of the second season. Lola is strong, outweighing the Ninja by 20 lbs. The ninja is skilled, a true warrior, silent and deadly. The ninja dominates Lola but struggles getting style points. During round 4, the Ninja takes out her frustration from the match on Lola in a bad way. The Ninja's lifetime record is now (5-0) with only 15 shame points. (Beware Caesar)
SITE IMPROVEMENTS
title: Crimson Ninja (0-0) vs. Lola (0-0)
